title: Syria: New Russian-Made Cluster Munition Reported (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) SPBE sensor fuzed submunitions in countryside near Kafr Halab , Syria on October 6, 2015 . ©2015 Shaam News Network ( Beirut ) – An advanced type of Russian cluster munition was used in an airstrike southwest
